summary: A talent scout moves sharply, dead-set on signing a promising athlete to his team.
cast: Keiji Sada|Keiko Kishi|Minoru Ôki|Yûnosuke Itô|Mitsuko Mito|Jun Tatara|Chiyotoshi Beppu|Haruko Chichibu|Yoshitaka Ebitsuka|Tokue Hanazawa|Shinkichi Hayabusa|Zenichi Inagawa|Tatsuya Ishiguro|Akio Isono|Haruko Kamei|Chisato Kasuga|Tokuji Kobayashi|Tatsuko Kusaka|Masami Maehata|Reiko Minakami|Kôji Mitsui|Jô Mitsumura|Ranko Omuro|Junkichi Orimoto|Takamaru Sasaki|Kyû Sazanka|Toshio Shimamura|Koji Shirotani|Isao Suenaga|Fujio Suga|Nobuo Takagi|Norikazu Takeda|Jun Tanizaki|Hisao Toake|Eijirô Tôno|Ryôhei Uchida|Tamae Wakasugi|Yoshiko Wakaume|Toshiyuki Ôkubo
title: Anata kaimasu
